title: Lower elasticity values, less tax impact on Q

content.question: Assume that the government imposes an excise tax on the consumption of a good. The tax will have the least impact on the market equilibrium quantity for which of the following combinations of the price elasticities of demand and supply?

choices.label:
Absolute Value of Elasticity of Demand
 Elasticity of Supply

4
 4

Absolute Value of Elasticity of Demand
 Elasticity of Supply

4
 0.50

Absolute Value of Elasticity of Demand
 Elasticity of Supply

1
 1

Absolute Value of Elasticity of Demand
 Elasticity of Supply

0.50
 4

Absolute Value of Elasticity of Demand
 Elasticity of Supply

0.50
 0.50

content.answer:
Absolute Value of Elasticity of Demand
 Elasticity of Supply

0.50
 0.50

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
